description: Checklist Lite will become your best friend right after usage; the application is simple it keeps track of tasks that need to be done without forgetting any of them, simply store and add your lists of to-dos and the things you need to pack when traveling. The application will help you relax even before you travel. With the filters available in the application, you will instantly have the full picture at what items you forgot and what the ones you skipped. Check List Lite saves a priority to each one of the items in the list so you wonâ€™t miss the most important ones. Classify your items in any list into bulks for faster packing & send you list to your all your family and friends, and more and more of useful additions No matter what you profession or age is, we all need something to remind us of our lists. You can upgrade to Checklist Pro and get your application free of ads, classify your items in any list into bulks for faster packing & send you list to your all your family and friends, and more and more of useful additions
